title: How to Grow Mint in an Apartment

steps.headline: Prepare the space to plant your mint.
steps.description: You can use a pot or a box.

steps.headline: Collect the soil to be put in the pot.
steps.description: The soil should be good quality soil suited for indoor plant growing.

steps.headline: Choose the mint for growing.
steps.description: You could use mint seeds or mint buds from a mint plant. Mint is very easily grown.

steps.headline: Fill the pot with the soil.
steps.description: Leave a half inch of the pot free of soil.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the mint seeds or carefully plant the mint buds.
Water it lightly.
steps.description: Place a saucer or dish under the container, to capture excess water and prevent it from staining any surfaces in your apartment.

parts.name: Taking care of the growing mint

steps.headline: Water it once a day.
steps.description: Increase the dosage of water as the plant grows. Water twice if necessary.

steps.headline: Keep the mint in a windowsill of your apartment, or near a good light source.
steps.description: Mint grows well with a lot of sunlight.

steps.headline: Harvest the mint regularly.
steps.description: This will increase the growth of the plant.

steps.headline: Split the plant and repot it if necessary.

text: Preparation Prepare the space to plant your mint. You can use a pot or a box. Collect the soil to be put in the pot. The soil should be good quality soil suited for indoor plant growing. Choose the mint for growing. You could use mint seeds or mint buds from a mint plant. Mint is very easily grown. Planting the mint Fill the pot with the soil. Leave a half inch of the pot free of soil. Sprinkle the mint seeds or carefully plant the mint buds.  Water it lightly. Place a saucer or dish under the container, to capture excess water and prevent it from staining any surfaces in your apartment. Taking care of the growing mint Water it once a day. Increase the dosage of water as the plant grows. Water twice if necessary. Keep the mint in a windowsill of your apartment, or near a good light source. Mint grows well with a lot of sunlight. Harvest the mint regularly. This will increase the growth of the plant. Split the plant and repot it if necessary.
